tei:classSpec.tei:gloss: articulation attribute class for symbolic time
tei:classSpec.tei:desc: This class provides symbolic time based attributes used for articulation definitions.

tei:attDef.tei:desc: Set the absolute duration of the note (in symbolic time).
Change the absolute duration of the note by the specified value (in symbolic time).
Change the duration of the note relatively to its initial value. E.g. a value of 0.5 halves the duration.
Delay the note by the specified value (in symbolic time).

tei:remarks.tei:p: The delay shifts the whole note, i.e. its onset and offset, along the time axis. If only the onset should be shifted, use attribute absoluteDurationChange to compensate the delay for the offset. In this case, the editor should take care that the note's duration is greater than the delay/compensation, i.e. no negative durations are created thereby.
